thread.title: Customers Bancorp, Inc. to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Call on July 23, 2015
thread.title_full: Customers Bancorp, Inc. to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Call on July 23, 2015

title: Customers Bancorp, Inc. to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Call on July 23, 2015
text:
July 15, 2015 16:15 ET Customers Bancorp, Inc. to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Call on July 23, 2015 
WYOMISSING, PA --(Marketwired - July 15, 2015) - Customers Bancorp, Inc. ( NYSE : CUBI ), the parent company of Customers Bank (collectively referred to as "Customers"), today announced that it will host a conference call at 10:00 AM ET on Thursday, July 23, 2015 to discuss its earnings results for the three months ended June 30, 2015. The second quarter 2015 earnings press release will be issued prior to the start of the earnings call. 
Date: Thursday, July 23, 2015 
Time: 10:00 AM ET 
Webcast: http://public.viavid.com/index.php?id=115214 
Please dial in at least 10 minutes before the start of the call to ensure timely participation. Slides accompanying the presentation will be available on the Company's website at http://customersbank.com/investor_relations.php prior to the call. 
Please submit any questions you have regarding Customers' second quarter 2015 earnings to rwahlman@customersbank.com and the executives will address them on the call. Due to time constraints, the Company may not be able to answer all questions submitted. 
A playback of the call will be available until 11:59 p.m. ET on August 23, 2015. To listen, call 1-877-870-5176 within the United States or 1-858-384-5517 when calling internationally. Please use the replay pin number 9816671. 
About Customers Bancorp, Inc. and Customers Bank 
Customers Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company located in Wyomissing, Pennsylvania engaged in banking and related businesses through its bank subsidiary, Customers Bank. Customers Bank is a community-based, full-service bank with assets of approximately $7.1 billion. A member of the Federal Reserve System and with deposits insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation , Customers Bank provides a range of banking services to small and medium-sized businesses, professionals, individuals and families through offices in Pennsylvania, New York, Rhode Island, Massachusetts, and New Jersey. Committed to fostering customer loyalty, Customers Bank uses a High Tech/High Touch strategy that includes use of industry-leading technology to provide customers better access to their money, as well as a continually expanding portfolio of loans to small businesses, multi-family projects, mortgage companies and consumers. 
Customers Bancorp, Inc.'s voting common shares are listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol CUBI. Additional information about Customers Bancorp, Inc. can be found on the company's website, www.customersbank.com .
